quote: Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: The groundwork of all happiness is health.
author: Leigh Hunt

quote: Health is not about the weight you lose, but about the life you gain.
author: Unknown

quote: Your body hears everything your mind says. Stay positive.
author: Unknown

quote: Progress, not perfection, is what we should be asking of ourselves.
author: Unknown

quote: Small daily improvements over time lead to stunning results.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: The only bad workout is the one that didn't happen.
author: Unknown

quote: You don't have to be extreme, just consistent.
author: Unknown

quote: Health is a relationship between you and your body.
author: Terri Guillemets

quote: Every accomplishment starts with the decision to try.
author: Unknown
